resources.string: Extra fat is annoying.This app will help you to burn extra fat of you body. Our workout length is only 10 minutes.Each set of workout is 2 minutes long. So 5 sets * 2 minutes = 10 minutes workout.Let\'s see the workout procedure.
Start with 10 seconds jumping.A little movement before any workout is very essential.
Now it\'s time to start the main workout.Do push-up for 20 seconds.After 20 seconds push up relax or do jumping for 10 secs.
Do some deep squats for 20 seconds.
Our 2 minutes first set is completed.Now repeat this procedure for 4 more times.
